meta_description: Located downtown by Millennium Park, this top art museum is TripAdvisor's #1 Chicago attraction—a must when visiting the city.
hours_text:
Today Open today 11–5

## VISIT

  * Hours
  * Location
  * Admission
  * Plan Your Visit
  * Who’s Visiting?
  * FAQs

[Buy Tickets](https://sales.artic.edu/admissions)

### Hours

* * *

Members: The first hour of every day, 10–11, is reserved for member-only viewing.  

Hours the museum is open each day | Days | Hours  
---|---|---  
Mon |  11–5  
Tue |  Closed  
Wed |  11–5  
Thu |  11–8  
Fri–Sun |  11–5  
  
The museum is closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.

### Location

* * *

Michigan Avenue Entrance 111 South Michigan Avenue  [Get directions ](https://goo.gl/maps/rWJ5uyDiokKyETnw6)

Modern Wing Entrance 159 East Monroe Street  [Get directions ](https://goo.gl/maps/W8aA5ZkFjVszc19LA)

[Transit & Parking](/directions-and-parking)

[Transit & Parking](/directions-and-parking)

### Admission

* * *

Types of admissions to visit the museum | Category  
---|---  
General Admission General admission includes access to the museum and all nonticketed exhibitions.   
Chicago Residents Proof of Chicago residence—valid ID, lease, bill, or other mail—is required.   
Illinois Residents Proof of Illinois residence—valid ID, lease, bill, or other mail—is required.   
Fast Pass Fast Pass allows visitors to bypass the general admission lines at entrances and offers expedited access to ticketed special exhibitions.   
Save with CityPASS® CityPASS® admission includes museum Fast Pass.   
General Admission Chicago Residents Illinois Residents Fast Pass Save with CityPASS...

## Share

  *   * 

The Art Institute of Chicago welcomes all visitors and is committed to making its programs and services accessible to everyone. We offer a range of resources and programs designed specifically for adults and children with disabilities.

**Manually operated wheelchairs are readily available, free of charge, at both of the museum’s checkrooms—no reservation required.** Personal wheelchairs are always welcome. 

Service animals are welcome.

collections_text:
**Welcome to the Art Institute of Chicago** [Plan Your Visit](https://www.artic.edu/visit)

Today Open today 11–5

## See all hours

  * Mon 11–5
  * Tue Closed
  * Wed 11–5
  * Thu 11–8
  * Fri–Sun 11–5
  * The first hour of every day, 10–11 a.m., is reserved for member-only viewing. 

Welcome to the Art Institute of Chicago, home to a [collection of art](https://www.artic.edu/collection) that spans centuries and the globe—and one of Tripadvisor’s “Best of the Best” US attractions of 2025. We look forward to [your visit](https://www.artic.edu/visit) and invite you to explore our many [exhibitions](https://www.artic.edu/exhibitions), join one of our [free daily tours](https://www.artic.edu/events?type=6&audience=3), or make [your own tour](https://www.artic.edu/my-museum-tour) of must-see works.  

[111 S Michigan Ave](https://goo.gl/maps/rWJ5uyDiokKyETnw6)

[Buy Tickets](https://sales.artic.edu/admissions)

FOLLOW US

[ ](https://www.instagram.com/artinstitutechi/) [ ](https://www.facebook.com/artic) [ ](https://twitter.com/artinstitutechi) [ ](https://www.youtube.com/user/ArtInstituteChicago)
